articles.title: David Jones Celebrates Year Of The Ox With Annual LNY Campaign, Via Paper Stone Scissors - B&T
articles.description: Paper Stone Scissors has unveiled its latest piece of work for David Jones, celebrating the Year of the Ox as part of its annual Lunar New Year creative campaign.
